about_the_game:
In a world driven by blackmail, time is not money...crime is. Do you have what it takes to uncover the truth while staring at the business end of a gun? Dark Data is a local multiplayer FPS based on the unreleased mid-nineties film of the same name. Square off in diverse locations with up to 3 friends and cutthroat digital Artificial Intelligence in full 360 degree combat. Coming Summer 2019 to your home entertainment system.

Game Types

  • Deathmatch
  • Team Deathmatch
  • HOLD YOUR DEATH
  • Capture The Floppy
  • Occupation

Up to 8 Combatants per Match

  • 1-4 Players
  • 1-7 AI

Kill with Variety and Style

  • 19 Unique Weapons
  • 11 Multiplayer Maps
  • State-of-the-Art Character Creator
  • Multitudes of Outfits and Accessories

Strive to become the leader on the Dark Data DIRTcoin leaderboards! Will you fight along the Corruptors to dismantle the DIRTcoin economy, or side with the government-backed Verification Agents who keep the system thriving? The choice is yours!
detailed_description:
Still in Development

Huge Update Coming Soon!

Though Dark Data is not in Early Access on Steam, it should have been, and is still in Full-Time Development. It has received nearly three more years of development since the launch of version 1, and version 2 is nearly complete! Dark Data has been worked on from the ground up and has gotten a lot of additional content, including a story campaign mode! I really appreciate all the support over the years and am extremely excited to release the mega-update. If you want to check out version 1 now or wishlist and wait for version 2, it means a lot!

Join the discord and ping me if you'd like access to internal Beta multiplayer builds!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.4Ghz Dual Core+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Xbox or Playstation controller recommended 1-4
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14
  • Processor: 2.9GHZ i5 or Better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Xbox or Playstation controller recommended 1-4

name: Dark Data

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.4Ghz Dual Core+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 or Better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Xbox or Playstation controller recommended 1-4
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.9GHZ i5 or Better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Xbox or Playstation controller recommended 1-4

reviews:
“This is a well-made game. It is unfinished obviously. But, you need to check it out soon.”
BrandonChoveyDotNet

“Dark Data feels especially novel, as its clearly a hat tip to a distinctive, platform-specific style of FPS, namely, Nintendo 64 classics like GoldenEye 007 and Perfect Dark”
Shaun Prescott , PC Gamer
short_description: In a world driven by blackmail, time is not money...crime is. Do you have what it takes to uncover the truth while staring at the business end of a gun? Dark Data is a local multiplayer FPS based on the unreleased mid-nineties film of the same name.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
